[[Image:DecXInterface.PNG|thumb|right|A screenshot of DecX]] DecX is a program which extracts [[DECORATE]] actors from wads into new wads, including all necessary sprites, sounds and code. As of version 2.0, it has facilities to recolour sprites and a built-in interface for editing [[DECORATE]] definitions complete with a syntax checker and syntax highlighting.
Its being developed by Niya. He can be reached via email at Xel_Niya@Yahoo.com
== Download ==
[http://mediafire.com/download/gdkc7shw6f7dn6t/DecXv20_r4.zip DecX v 2.0]
== Features ==
* The ability to recolour sprites as well as save them in either PNG format of Doom's own native format.
* Syntax checking
* Syntax highlighting.
* The ability to "test run" actors.
* An organised way of viewing actor definitions. You can view the whole [[DECORATE]], an actor along with all its supporting actors, or an actor by it self.
* A structured way of seeing all the actors present in a wad by type. For example a projectile or a monster are types.
